org.apache.jena.atlas.io

Class PeekReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • org.apache.jena.atlas.io.PeekReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public final class PeekReader
extends Reader
    Parsing-centric reader. This class is not thread safe.
    See Also:
    PeekInputStream
